summary: This is an FBI email chain from July 2020 forwarding a tip from a witness who reported seeing Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, Long Island. The witness claims Maxwell is deeply connected to Jeffrey Epstein, helped procure underage girls for him, and may be hiding in Narragansett. The witness also states she was personally abused and is open to contact.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of sighting tip, alleged associate of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: A witness reported seeing her in East Hampton, Long Island, and stated she is deeply connected to Jeffrey Epstein and helped procure underage girls for him. The witness claimed Maxwell appeared to be in disguise.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Referenced as the person Ghislaine Maxwell is deeply connected to and for whom she allegedly helped procure underage girls.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: The recipient and forwarder of the email tip about the Ghislaine Maxwell sighting.

persons.name: NY enny0000
persons.context: The original sender who relayed the witness tip about seeing Ghislaine Maxwell to the SSA.

connections.description: The witness states Maxwell is 'deeply connected' to Epstein and helped procure underage girls for him.
A friend of the witness has a brother (FNU LNU) who is friends with Maxwell, and he believes she is hiding in Narragansett.

events.title: Witness sighting of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A witness reported seeing Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton Town, Long Island. The witness claimed Maxwell was wearing 'homely clothes' to avoid attention and panicked upon being recognized.

events.title: Witness tip called into NYOC
events.description: A witness called the New York Office (NYOC) to notify the FBI of the Maxwell sighting and provide allegations about her role in procuring underage girls for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: East Hampton Town, Long Island, NY
keyFacts: In July 2020, a witness reported a sighting of Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, Long Island, claiming she was wearing 'homely clothes' to avoid detection.
The witness alleged that Ghislaine Maxwell was 'deeply connected' to Jeffrey Epstein and helped procure underage girls for him.
The witness stated that Maxwell previously owned a small high-end boutique in Sag Harbor, Long Island.
The tip suggested Maxwell might be hiding in Narragansett, based on information from a friend's brother.
The witness claimed to have been personally abused in her life and was open to further contact with the FBI.
